segment.source: Planning for UE-V Configuration
segment.target: Planning for UE-V Configuration

segment.source: Planning for UE-V Configuration
segment.target: Planning for UE-V Configuration

segment.source: You can configure Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) to meet the specific needs of your enterprise by defining which applications are deployed and which configurations define the UE-V behavior.
segment.target: You can configure Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) to meet the specific needs of your enterprise by defining which applications are deployed and which configurations define the UE-V behavior.

segment.source: Plan which applications to synchronize with UE-V
segment.target: Plan which applications to synchronize with UE-V

segment.source: UE-V includes a set of predefined settings location templates.
segment.target: UE-V includes a set of predefined settings location templates.

segment.source: UE-V also allows administrators to create custom settings location templates for other applications, including third-party or line-of-business applications that are used in the enterprise.
segment.target: UE-V also allows administrators to create custom settings location templates for other applications, including third-party or line-of-business applications that are used in the enterprise.

segment.source: This topic includes a list of applications that are included with the UE-V client and guidance on how to include custom settings location templates.
segment.target: This topic includes a list of applications that are included with the UE-V client and guidance on how to include custom settings location templates.

segment.source: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V
segment.target: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V

segment.source: Guidance on whether a line-of-business application should be synchronized.
segment.target: Guidance on whether a line-of-business application should be synchronized.

segment.source: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Plan custom template deployment
segment.target: Plan custom template deployment

segment.source: In order to support other applications, including third-party applications, you must create custom settings location templates by using the UE-V Generator, and deploy them to a settings template catalog.
segment.target: In order to support other applications, including third-party applications, you must create custom settings location templates by using the UE-V Generator, and deploy them to a settings template catalog.

segment.source: Planning for Custom Template Deployment for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Planning for Custom Template Deployment for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Plan for UE-V configuration
segment.target: Plan for UE-V configuration

segment.source: UE-V configurations determine how settings are synchronized throughout the enterprise.
segment.target: UE-V configurations determine how settings are synchronized throughout the enterprise.

segment.source: These configurations can be made before, during, or after the UE-V Agent is deployed.
segment.target: These configurations can be made before, during, or after the UE-V Agent is deployed.

segment.source: UE-V provides a variety of configuration methods
segment.target: UE-V provides a variety of configuration methods

segment.source: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods
segment.target: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods
